text.0: i send forth even your god victorious agni like a strong courser with mine adoration.
text.1: herald of sacrifice be he who knoweth he hath reached gods himself with measured motion.
text.2: by paths that are thine own come hither agni joyous delighting in the gods alliance.
text.3: making the heights of earth roar with thy fury burning with eager teeth the woods and forests.
text.4: the grass is strewn the sacrifice advances adored as priest agni is made propitious.
text.5: invoking both allboonbestowing mothers of whom most youthful thou wast born to help us.
text.6: forthwith the men the best of these for wisdom have made him leader in the solemn worship.
text.7: as lord in homes of men is agni stablished the holy one the joyous sweetly speaking.
text.8: he hath come chosen bearer and is seated in mans home brahman agni the supporter.
text.9: he whom both heaven anct earth exalt and strengthenwhom giver of all boons the hotar worships.
text.10: these have passed all in glory who the manly have wrought with skill the hymn of adoration.
text.11: who listening have advanced the peoples welfare and set their thoughts on this my holy statute.
text.12: we the vasisthas now implore thee agni o son of strength the lord of wealth and treasure.
text.13: thou hast brought food to singers and to nobles ye gods preserve us evermore with blessings.
